channel.title: cores2022 on Matthieu Gouel

item.title: Zeph & Iris map the internet: A resilient reinforcement learning approach to distributed IP route tracing
item.description: Matthieu Gouel, Kevin Vermeulen, Maxime Mouchet, Justin P. Rohrer, Olivier Fourmaux, Timur Friedman Representation of the IP-level graph of the internet measured with Iris. We describe a new system for distributed tracing at the IP level of the routes that packets take through the IPv4 internet. Our Zeph algorithm coordinates route tracing efforts across agents at multiple vantage points, assigning to each agent a number of /24 destination prefixes in proportion to its probing budget and chosen according to a reinforcement learning heuristic that aims to maximize the number of multipath links discovered.
